history.proof: intros p aP. induction p; simpl; intros; auto. shelve.

exceptions.tactic: destruct (Reducef A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os aP p) as [x _].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) x : list (Term A n) p : canonical A0 eqA ltM x aP : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) The term "p" has type "canonical A0 eqA ltM x" while it is expected to have type "poly A0 eqA ltM".
Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) x : list (Term A n) p : canonical A0 eqA ltM x aP : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Unable to unify "olist ?M2251 (mults ?M2246 ?M2253 ?M2254) /\\ nZterm ?M2240 ?M2242 (mults ?M2246 ?M2253 ?M2254)" with "forall q : list (Term A n), ~ reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec aP (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM (nf (exist (fun a : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM a) x p) aP)) q".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (p : poly A0 eqA ltM) (aP : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec aP (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM (nf p aP))

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
s2p : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), poly A0 eqA ltM -> list (Term A n)
irreducible : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
nf = fun (p : poly A0 eqA ltM) (L : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) => let (x, _) := Reducef A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os L p in LetP (poly A0 eqA ltM) (poly A0 eqA ltM) x (fun (u : poly A0 eqA ltM) (_ : u = x) => let (x0, H'2) := u in exist (fun a : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM a) (mults multA (n:=n) (unit (mks A A0 eqA n ltM x0 H'2)) x0) (canonical_mults A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
OrderStructure : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
poly : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> Type

reduceplus_mults : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (mults multA (n:=n) a q)
reduce_mults : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (mults multA (n:=n) a q)
reduceplus_mults_inv : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q

reduce_eqp_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q r s
reduceplus_eqp_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q r s

rep_minus_reduce : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> exists p1 q1 : list (Term A n), reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p p1 /\ reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q q1 /\ eqP A eqA n s (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p1 q1)
pluspf_minuspf_id : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q) q) p
minuspf_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q) (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec r s)

```coq
intros p aP.
induction p; simpl; intros; auto.
destruct (Reducef A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os aP p) as [x _].
destruct x as [u _].
destruct u as [x0 H'2].
apply exist with (mults multA (unit (mks A A0 eqA n ltM x0 H'2)) x0).
apply canonical_mults.
Qed. 
```

original: intros p aP. induction p; simpl; intros; auto. destruct (Reducef A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os aP p) as [x _]. destruct x as [u _]. destruct u as [x0 H'2]. apply exist with (mults multA (unit (mks A A0 eqA n ltM x0 H'2)) x0). apply canonical_mults.
